features: Multifunctional gel seat cushion. Using a soft and elastic gel material, the structure is upgraded to a thicker double layer , which is extremely flexible and can be squeezed back to its original shape immediately after stretching. In addition, the honeycomb structure gel and breathable cloth both keep the air flow, keeping your seat comfortable throughout the day.

The gel pad has magical cushioning properties, even if you put the egg and sit down, the egg will not break. This is the result of a real test. If you are interested, you can also experience it with your family.

As shown in the main picture, our seat cushion comes with 2 upgraded and washable covers.The covers are designed with a smooth zipper, which facilitates the removal of the inner rubber cushion, which can better cleaned without worrying about soiling the seat. And our gel cushion is different from the memory foam seat cushion. It can be washed directly with water and quickly ventilated to dry, which is convenient for storage.

This chair cushion can relieve the pressure on the tailbone, which is very helpful for back pain and tailbone pain after sitting for a long time. It is very suitable for sedentary office workers, drivers or pregnant mothers. In addition, it can also be placed on the floor as a kneeling mat for yoga and meditation. You can even put it on a bench when you take it to a sporting event. Of course, it can also be used for pet pads.

High-elasticity TPE gel, Non-Slip covers, Portable carrying handle transport, Removable breathable cloth cover, about 16.5 x 14.5 x 2.4 inch / (42 x 37 x 6cm) ，Suitable size and lightweight enough to bring with you wherever you need it! Want to freshen it up? Simply remove the cover and pop it in the wash. The best gift, Suitable for elders, friends and lovers ~ You deserve to have!
body.description: Our product includes 1 cover and one gel cushion, which utilizes advanced gel technology. When seated, it feels like being on a soft sofa. It is conforms to the shape of your hips, thus providing soft support., reducing discomfort and fatigue from prolonged sitting.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Hand wash the inner core. Machine wash the fabric cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this cushion
reviews.reviewText: This has made sitting for longer periods of time easier for me! I have issues sitting for long periods from the discomfort that it causes and this has greatly improved that durability when sitting! I take this everywhere with me and haven't had a single problem since getting it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I got this super large gel seat cushion to put on my gaming chair because the stitching in the seat is tearing apart. I have mixed feelings about this cushion. It’s large! Which is awesome! I have big hips and back end, I hate the feeling of flowing off the sides of cushions and chairs that are too small. So I really appreciate the larger size and it actually fits my gaming chair perfectly. The covers for the cushion look really cheap. When I first opened it, I thought they were covers to wash the insert, not the actual cover itself. I don’t know if I’m missing something and the cover shouldn’t be used? In the pictures it shows models not using the covers, so I’m not sure. The cushion is really comfortable. I can sit for extended times and not feel discomfort like I do without the cushion. I like that the honeycomb structure allows for airflow, so you don’t get sweaty there when warmer. One more thing, I wish there was a way to attach this to the chair, even if there was a Velcro strap to make it stay in place when getting up and down. I am having to adjust it every time I move. I have noticed that if you use it without the cover, it stays in place in better. Another bonus is it being washable. It also adds some height to you. I’m 5-10 and don’t need the extra height, but it’s the perfect height to work on my posture. It makes my knees 90 degrees and my elbows at the table 90 degree. I also seem to keep my back straighter. So it’s worth it just for that alone. Even though I have mixed feelings about this cushion, I am still glad I got it and would probably get it again. I might try to make a cover for it to make it a little more stylish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable to sit on and the cats like it also
reviews.reviewText: The Anzeng Gel Seat Cushion is what my wife has needed when she spends hours sitting on the floor, sorting and cataloging small Lego pieces she uses at work. She had previously been sitting on a throw pillow but it only provided comfort for a while. The Anzeng Gel Cushion allows her to spend much more time in a comfortable position and it’s large enough to allow moving around but still stay on the cushion. So why do the cats like it? Because they now have full time use of the pillow she was using. They just have to take turns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is made really well made, and does the job. I use it on the couch and with my computer chair, I've even used it on a folding chair during Thanksgiving, and it worked great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Relief at a reasonable cost
reviews.reviewText: I got this pad because I have serious lower back issues and I was looking for something to work on my office chair in conjunction with lumbar support to make sitting less on a torture test. This pad comes with two attractive covers. Both the covers and the seat pad are easily washable.You gotta love the folks who write marketing copy for products, amplifying every tiny detail into grandiose proclamations. This is a piece of honeycombed thermoplastic rubber with a removable mesh cover. That’s all it is. I cannot attest to any magical properties claimed on the web page, nor can I determine if my buttocks have become more beautiful after using this seat cushion. I wasn’t courageous enough to test this with an egg on my good office chair. But I can with certainly say that it’s more comfortable sitting on this pad than on my office chair without the pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As I've gotten older, I find it more and more uncomfortable to sit on hard surfaces like bleachers. I enjoy attending my grandkids games and performances, so I knew I had to find a decent cushion.This is just the ticket. I didn't want a stadium seat style, just a cushion, and this one is great. Thanks to the gripping surface on one side, it doesn't slide around. It's supportive, firm, but comfy. The material seems sturdy, and the construction is good quality. It's a little big, but that could be a plus for some people. The separate cover is a nice bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is a great alternative to the Purple brands' seat cushions (which I also own). I don't use this on a desk chair, I actually ordered it for floor seating. It's perfect for my needs and super comfy.I appreciate that the cover is easily removable - it's going to make cleaning it a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big. Comfortable. Raises your height in the car
reviews.reviewText: We got this for use in the car, especially for longer trips. We are using it in a Toyota Sienna minivan and it covers the front seat (Driver's or Passenger's) completely. Any bigger and it would be too big.It is comfortable. A little unwieldy when you need to move it around, but usually you are just placing it and sitting on it. I found that my rear end is much less sore after longer drivers (especially more than a couple hours) when I use this than when sitting on the car seat itself.The product description shows using it on an airplane. You could, for sure, but like I said, it is a little unwieldy and taking it on a plan would take some of your precious bag space.Using this does raise you up in the seat. This can be a good thing for someone who wants to be a little higher. It can be a bad thing if your head is already close to the top of the vehicle. If you don't have much clearance when you sit in your car seat, adding this might cause your head to hit the ceiling.It is great that it has two covers, so you can wash one while using the other.At $40 it is a little steep in price, but worth it if you use it regularly. The price is the main reason I gave it 4 stars. I think it should be in the $30 range.
